credit_remaining.map: function(doc) { if ( (doc.pvt_type != 'credit' && doc.pvt_type != 'debit') || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var modifier = (doc.pvt_type == 'credit' ? 1 : -1), amount = doc.pvt_amount || doc.amount; emit(null, amount * modifier); }

allotment_consumed.map: function(doc) { if ( (doc.pvt_type != 'credit_allotment' && doc.pvt_type != 'debit_allotment') || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var modifier = (doc.pvt_type == 'credit_allotment' ? 1 : -1); emit([doc.name, doc.pvt_created], doc.amount * modifier); }

session_cost.map: function(doc) { if ( (doc.pvt_type != 'credit' && doc.pvt_type != 'debit') || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.session_id) return; var modifier = (doc.pvt_type == 'credit' ? 1 : -1), amount = doc.pvt_amount || doc.amount; emit(null, amount * modifier);  }

session_allotment.map: function(doc) { if ( (doc.pvt_type != 'credit_allotment' && doc.pvt_type != 'debit_allotment') || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.session_id) return; var modifier = (doc.pvt_type == 'credit_allotment' ? 1 : -1); emit(doc.session_id, doc.amount * modifier);  }

by_timestamp.map: function(doc) { if ( (doc.pvt_type != 'credit' && doc.pvt_type != 'debit') || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_created, doc._id); }
